metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3105 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. uapi_finalizein drivers/infiniband/core/uverbs_uapi.c lacks check of kmalloc_array().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
